message.content: cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR. The paper discusses progress in language and image understanding by machines, which are key topics in the fields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG), and information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper specifically focuses on a holistic task of question answering about images, which is a subfield of computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.AI, cs.CV, and cs.CL, followed by cs.LG and cs.IR.
